explains: adj. 色情的；性爱的；性欲的

sentences.en: Some men are aroused when their partner says erotic words to them.
sentences.cn: 一些男人在性伙伴对他们说色情话时会被撩起性欲。

sentences.en: What do you mean by erotic?
sentences.cn: 你说的厄洛斯的是什么意思？

sentences.en: The erotic is more of the imagination part.
sentences.cn: 厄洛斯的更类似于想象力的那部分。
